mutants.code:
def can_make_pali_queries(s, queries):
    prefix_sum = [[0] * 26]
    for ch in s:
        new = prefix_sum[-1][:]
        new[ord(ch) - ord('a')] -= 1
        prefix_sum.append(new)
    res = []
    for (left, right, k) in queries:
        odd_counts = sum(((prefix_sum[right + 1][i] - (prefix_sum[left][i] if left > 0 else 0)) % 2 for i in range(26)))
        res.append(odd_counts // 2 <= k)
    return res
